channel.title: Client error when running on VPS
channel.description:
Okay so adding my server to my VPS and putting it online went smooth, but for some reason when I log in when it's connected to the VPS I get some odd errors.. It doesn't display the client correctly.. and I can't move the character or anything. Or even log out! I have to close the client. http://prntscr.com/723w68 - http://prntscr.com/76v8zr
But when running off my own IP (127.0.0.1) and not using the VPS it runs perfectly.
Thank you for any help

item.title: Client error when running on VPS

Woah deja vu
